articles.title: Ellen McIlwaine, Slide Guitarist With a Power Voice, Dies at 75
articles.description: Early in her career she played with Jimi Hendrix. She went on to record several well-regarded albums. But she remained under the radar.

When we came back to the United States and I started college in Tennessee, the only piano was in the boys dorm, she said, so I borrowed a guitar that belonged to somebody, and I liked it.

articles.title: She Heard His Voice and Found Her Soul Mate
articles.description: Natasha Grano and Michael Graziano met through the social media app Clubhouse. About 27,000 people attended their wedding on the audio-only platform.

articles.author: The New York Times
articles.title: Studies Show Vaccines Are Effective Against Delta Variant
articles.description: Israel reported that the Pfizer vaccine was 64 percent effective against the Delta variant, even as other studies suggest a higher rate. All of the research so far indicates that vaccines help prevent hospitalization.
